title: Modern Family Home with Sauna and Pet-Friendly Garden in Polesie
description: Step into this sun-filled, intelligently designed house offering 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 stylish bathrooms within 190 sqm. The open-plan living and dining areas are accented by a cutting-edge modern lighting system, perfect for entertaining or relaxing after work. Enjoy a dedicated sauna for at-home wellness, a secured entry, and eco-conscious features including a rainwater collection system. For guests or gatherings, benefit from the convenience of an additional bathroom on the ground floor.
neighborhood_description: Located in Polesie, one of Lodz’s most up-and-coming districts, the area blends historic buildings with a fresh, tech-forward spirit. Tree-lined avenues and greenspaces set a peaceful tone while cycle paths, cafés, and co-working spaces contribute to its urban appeal. With a pet-friendly atmosphere and a growing local scene, it’s ideal for active young professionals and their four-legged friends.
lifestyle_benefits: ample space for pets inside and outdoors
easy commute by public transit or bike
target_buyer: Young professionals or families who value smart urban living and want a contemporary, energy-efficient home with space for pets.
market_positioning: A unique balance of comfort, technology, and lifestyle: not just another suburban house, but a tailored opportunity for forward-thinking Movers & Makers in the next-generation Polesie market.
